pages.text: A $(item)Fletching Table$() is a $(l:creatures/human-villager#fletcher)$(thing)Fletcher's$() job site block that can generate naturally in $(l:world/structures#village)$(thing)Villages$(). $(br2)The $(item)Fletching Table$() is used to turn an unemployed $(l:creatures/human-villager)$(thing)Villager$() into a $(l:creatures/human-villager#fletcher)$(thing)Fletcher$().
